mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM(SELECT notice_seq, notice_title, notice_writer, notice_content, notice_date, @rownum:=@rownum + 1 as rnum FROM notice, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP
AND notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND notice_date >= #{startDate} AND notice_date <= #{endDate} AND notice_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{date}, '%')
ORDER BY notice_date DESC) B WHERE
rnum = #{seq}
rnum > (#{page} - 1) *5 AND rnum <= #{page} * 5 ORDER BY notice_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(notice_seq, notice_title, notice_writer, notice_date, notice_content, notice_file, notice_location, notice_passwd, notice_cnt) VALUES (null, #{notice_title}, #{notice_writer}, default, #{notice_content}, #{notice_fileName}, #{notice_location}, #{notice_passwd}, #{notice_cnt})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_file=#{notice_fileName}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, notice_location=#{notice_location} WHERE notice_seq=#{notice_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE notice_seq = #{notice_seq} AND notice_passwd = #{notice_passwd}
